thread.title: Mai-Kai named top tiki bar on the planet
thread.title_full: Mai-Kai named top tiki bar on the planet

author: John Tanasychuk
title: Mai-Kai named top tiki bar on the planet
text:
See more galleries 
“There’s simply no matching the Mai-Kai, in either the grand scale or the minute attention to detail in the décor,” Critiki says in its rating. “The Mai-Kai has multiple dining rooms, each themed for a different island group, a literal ship-shape bar, a gift shop, winding tropical gardens, musicians, dancers, and an array of Oceanic art and culture on display every way you turn.” 
Critiki says no other venue “provides such a transporting experience to the heyday of American Polynesian fine dining.” 
In February, the Mai-Kai was named to the National Register of Historic Places.
